entities.name: Naukri_API_Authentication
observations: Naukri API v3 requires authenticated browser session cookies
Headers alone insufficient: appid, systemid, clientid, gid tested - all failed with 406
Direct API calls without browser session = 406 Not Acceptable
Solution: Use Playwright to establish session, then API calls work
Test file already configured: test_naukri_20_validation.py uses scrape_naukri_jobs_unified
Discovery date: 2025-10-14 after 3 failed test runs

entities.name: JobSpy
observations: Free LinkedIn scraping library - python-jobspy v1.1.82
Cost savings: $250+ vs BrightData datasets
Supports 6+ platforms: LinkedIn, Indeed, ZipRecruiter, Glassdoor, Google Jobs, Naukri
Pure HTTP requests - no browser automation overhead
Returns pandas DataFrame with rich schema
Built-in proxy support (optional)
Works perfectly without proxy for 50-200 jobs/session
Successfully tested: 10 jobs scraped in 30 seconds
